Terrain::TerrainSettings

Terrain::TerrainSettings Class Reference

This class keeps the current terrain settings, usually read from the file space.settings, keeps track of other runtime settings, and inits the appropriate terrain render in the 'init' method. More...

#include <terrain_settings.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class keeps the current terrain settings, usually read from the file space.settings, keeps track of other runtime settings, and inits the appropriate terrain render in the 'init' method.

bool TerrainSettings::init ( DataSectionPtr  settings  )
